extendedInfo.description: Did you ever dream of flying down the highest mountains in the world? Now it's your time, join the Wingsuit Stickman experience, pack your wingsuit and glide through beautiful landscapes, cross the Alps, fly down the Rocky Mountains or enter a deadly volcano while performing insane stunts, scaring birds and plane pilots and simply enjoy the wonderful experience of a perfect wingsuit proximity flight. âââââ Regular content updates with new and amazing levels coming every few weeks âââââ â From the makers of various top 100 apps like Stick Stunt Biker, Line Runner, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer, RunStickRun and more â Wingsuit Stickman is in the top 10 overall in various countries including Australia, Austria, Germany, Italy, France, UK, US, etc.. FEATURES: â¢ Includes more than 25 beautiful designed levels from "Relaxed gliding" to "Jump into a deadly volcano" â¢ Full mission system with more than 30 different missions to pass â¢ Customization shop to customize your player with collected coins â¢ Full animated physic rag doll â¢ Amazing Retina Graphics â¢ Complete physics enabled â¢ Various obstacles like Planes, Birds, Wind wheels, Waters, Volcanos, and even Transylvanian death wasps â¢ Perform cool stunts to earn extra bonus â¢ Different environments â¢ Agil and fast reacting wingsuit experience using accelerometer technology â¢ and many more... All levels can of course be played for free, the optional in-app purchases just allows you to play them immediately instead of having to progress through the game. Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Load of fun
reviews.comment: One of the best games ever I love it . It is very fun to play in you spare time or whenever it is that fun
reviews.author: mattyp procter

reviews.title: 5 stars, get it.
reviews.comment: Asus Nexus 7 Very relaxing and challenging, job well done. Make more apps like this please, I know there\'s tons of solid stickman games, but this ones so smooth and fun to get the hang of, literally.
reviews.author: Cydney Rose

reviews.title: Excellent...
reviews.comment: Really good game. Most of the upgrades are affordable. N very cool levels. Waiting for more.
reviews.author: Kunal Bahuguna

reviews.title: New update any time soon?
reviews.comment: Needs more levels, amazing game though
reviews.author: David Ellenberger

reviews.title: Really nice original idea game
reviews.comment: The game is very nice, and will get use to it in a few trys.  High recommend, and I appreciate the freebies :-)
reviews.author: Abdulelah Almalhem

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Such a cool game. Would be really cool if we could do 360s, would add another dimension abd maybe more levels. But all in all really good and well thought out. I like a game that\'s not designed for those with meat loaf for brains
reviews.author: Fay-yaaz Ahmed

reviews.title: Entertaining game
reviews.comment: Fun game, some levels are pretty challenging. It\'s nice to play a game you can\'t beat in 5 mins while waiting for an appointment.
reviews.author: samuel fuentes

reviews.title: Satisfied
reviews.comment: I like this great game because I was challenged in controling, I also like the quality and the graphics was great. This game was better than other games which is undisatisfying and also bad in graphic qualities. I reccommend this game to those who like sky diving games. Nc work. Wish you could make more better games rather than this.
reviews.author: Michael Monroy

reviews.title: Awesome game(s)!
reviews.comment: Consistantly challenging yet addictively playable.. you don\'t need to be an octopus to learn control... Try one, you\'ll download other games from this company... Unless you\'re an idiot... Five well deserved stars upon thars!
reviews.author: Brian Luciano

reviews.title: Djinnworks is definitely in the top 5 best developers on the market!
reviews.comment: They hit another home run- right out of the park! This game is awesome. They just keep getting better and better. Graphics, controls, fps and smoothness just can\'t be beat. You\'ve got to download this!
reviews.author: pete shelby

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: Definetly the best game I\'ve ever played djinworks did very good on this app but the only problem is that the advertisrments pop. Up and stuff like that Its still such aa fun game that despite the aadds its still a 5 stars game!!
reviews.author: Aditya Parikh

reviews.title: It\'s OK but...
reviews.comment: Long delay in rotation controls frustrating at best. Concept is good but execution poor. Oh and if you hit the goal you still crash instead of having a cool landing. Maybe future updates will bring needed improvements.
reviews.author: Gary W Allen

reviews.title: I LIKE IT!
reviews.comment: Simple. Addicting. A lot more challenging than it looks... definitely worth the download.
reviews.author: Allen Chase

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Tilt games have problems cuz the accelerometer is way too sensitive. It was fun.. but when you lose control it\'s done. Plus if you accidentally hit the ball button it exits.. you come back in and your in the ground. Not cool.
reviews.author: Charles Lein

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: Good game and fun to play, with great stick man physics, gets more difficult as goes on and took some time to do later on in the levels.
reviews.author: Jack Westcott

reviews.title: The best game ever
reviews.comment: This game is soo fun its hard to play at first but then u get used to it I will happily give this game 1,000,000 thumbs up if I had that many
reviews.author: Aaron Hooks

reviews.title: It\'s alright
reviews.comment: Needs better flight controls, but besides that it\'s a good game
reviews.author: Travis Hodgkinson

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Really good game, I think the only improvement that could be made and written into the game/odd level would be to allow the stick man to land if he is tilted upright, slowed right down and very low to the ground.   Highly recommend this game, and the others which are similar
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: galaxy 3
reviews.comment: this game is awesome until I got up to about the 6th stage it kept force closing so I un installed it. Otherwise it was a challenging and time filling game. fix the glitch and ill rate 5.stars.
reviews.author: Brendan Earl

reviews.title: Wingsuit Stickman
reviews.comment: This is one of my favorite games. I am a gaming perfectionist so trying to get three stars in each level can be a huge time killer. Very addictive and if you like this game you should also try Stickman Base Jumper. Thank you to the dev team, great game.
reviews.author: Darth Papa
